mdRecord.dcterms:title: Urine-sugar test tablets
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Ames Company
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Two tablet-filled brown glass bottles with blue metal cap. Label information: 100 Tablets; Federal Stock No. 6505-149-0220; Urine-Sugar Test Tablets; Clinitest (Brand) Reagent Tablets; Pat. Nos. 2,387,244 - RE. 23,705; Active ingredients: Copper Sulfate, Caustic Soda, Sodium Carbonate, Citric Acid; Poison; Ames Company, Inc. Elkhart, Indiana, U.S.A. "Instructions for use of Clinitest Reagent Tablets" included.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical laboratory technology
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
